trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawItem" name="DrawItem" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawItem" name="DrawItem" href=""> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The `DrawItem` event is raised by owner draw controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: Den `DrawItem` denne hendelsen oppstår av eieren draw kontroller, for eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: It contains all the information that is needed for the user to paint the specified item, including the item index, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: Den inneholder all informasjonen som kreves for brukeren fargemerknader i det angitte elementet, inkludert elementet indeksen, og den <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, og <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>på tegning skal utføres.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> klasse for den angitte kontrollen med den angitte skriften tilstand, surface til å tegne på og grensene til å tegne i.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> surface som tegn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to use, usually the parent control's <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> skal brukes, vanligvis overordnede kontrollens <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> grenser til å tegne i.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> indeks verdien for elementet som det tegnes.

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollens <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, foreground color, background color, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> klasse for den angitte kontrollen med den angitte skriften, tilstand, forgrunnsfarge, bakgrunnsfarge, surface til å tegne på og grensene til å tegne i.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> surface som tegn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to use, usually the parent control's <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> skal brukes, vanligvis overordnede kontrollens <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> grenser til å tegne i.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> indeks verdien for elementet som det tegnes.

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollens <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: Forgrunnen <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> til å tegne kontrollen med.

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnen <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> til å tegne kontrollen med.

trans-unit.source: Gets the background color of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter bakgrunnsfargen for elementet som det tegnes.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, the BackColor is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis elementet tilstand <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, bakgrunnsfargen til <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the BackColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis elementet ikke er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, egenskapen bakgrunnsfarge til <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnen <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> for elementet som det tegnes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter rektanglet som representerer grensene for elementet som det tegnes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer grensene for elementet som det tegnes.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background within the bounds specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor and with the appropriate color.
trans-unit.target: Tegner bakgrunnen i område som er angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> konstruktøren og med farge.

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the background is drawn with the text highlighted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det tegnes-elementet er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, bakgrunnen tegnes med teksten merket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle within the bounds specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Tegner Fokusrektangelet i område som er angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the focus rectangle is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Hvis elementet er tegnet har <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, Fokusrektangelet tegnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the font that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter skriften som er tilordnet til elementet som tegnes.

trans-unit.source: A suggested <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, usually the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: En foreslåtte <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, vanligvis av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>-egenskapen til den overordnede kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> som er tilordnet til elementet som tegnes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the foreground color of the of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter forgrunnsfargen på det for elementet som tegnes.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, the ForeColor is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis elementet tilstand <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, forgrunnsfargen til <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the ForeColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis elementet ikke er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, egenskapen ForeColor til <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Forgrunnen <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> for elementet som tegnes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: Henter grafikk overflaten til å tegne elementet på.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> overflate til å tegne elementet på.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksverdien for elementet som det tegnes.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A> value of the item being drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A>verdien for elementet som tegnes i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can return -1 if itemswere removed from the list.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan Returner-1 Hvis itemswere fjernet fra listen.

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*> value of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den numeriske verdien som representerer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*>verdi for elementet som tegnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for elementet som tegnes.

trans-unit.source: This property value can be a combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState> enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapsverdien kan være en kombinasjon av det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>opplisting medlemmer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: The members can be combined by using bitwise operators.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmene kan kombineres ved hjelp av bitvis operatorene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> that represents the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> som representerer statusen for elementet som tegnes.
